hero.title: Python Backend Engineer
hero.tagline: Building Scalable Python Applications • Distributed Systems • APIs • Machine Learning

about.title: About Me
about.summary: Backend Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable Python applications using Django, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL. Expert in REST API design, performance optimization, and containerized deployment. Strong foundation in distributed systems, microservices architecture, and machine learning pipelines. Proven track record of improving system performance by 30–40% and processing 50,000+ documents with 95%+ accuracy. 200+ LeetCode problems solved demonstrating advanced algorithmic proficiency.

languages.certification: NAT 3Q Certification (Currently studying for JLPT N2)
